mapper.insert: insert into qna (userid, subject, content, hit, regtime) values (#{userid}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, now())
mapper.select:
select articleno, userid, subject, content, hit, case when date_format(regtime, '%Y%m%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d') then date_format(regtime, '%H:%i:%s') else date_format(regtime, '%y.%m.%d') end regtime from qna
where subject like concat('%', #{word}, '%')
order by articleno desc

SELECT b.articleno, b.userid, u.email, u.USER_PROFILE_IMAGE_URL, b.subject, b.content, b.regtime, b.hit FROM qna b, member u WHERE b.userid = u.userid ORDER BY b.articleno DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT b.articleno, b.userid, u.email, u.USER_PROFILE_IMAGE_URL, b.subject, b.content, b.regtime, b.hit FROM qna b, member u WHERE b.userid = u.userid AND b.subject LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord} ,'%') ORDER BY b.articleno DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
